example.name: autogen1
example.text: Though Sir James has said he intends to mount a new bid for B.A.T once approval from U.S. insurance regulators is received , jitters over prospects for junk-bond financing and U.S. leverage buy-outs are making investors more skeptical about Sir James 's prospects .
example.arg: over prospects for junk-bond financing and U.S. leverage buy-outs
